alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:16AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, Sumter, Pasco, Hernando, southeastern Levy, northwestern Manatee, Pinellas, Hillsborough and northwestern Polk Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 515 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Timber Pines to near Land O Lakes to East Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, Lakeland, Largo, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Seminole, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Palmetto, Brooksville, Inverness, Wildwood, Dade City, Bushnell, Hudson, Fort Desoto Park, and Beverly Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northern, central and west central Florida.
